text: Mary Holt (31 July 1924 – 17 February 2021) was a British Conservative politician and judge. Holt was Member of Parliament (MP) for Preston North from 1970 to 1974. From 1977 to 1995, Holt was a circuit court judge. Holt died in Fulwood, Preston on 17 February 2021 at the age of 96.Mary Holt death notice ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2021 deaths Category:UK MPs 1970–1974 Category:English judges Category:Conservative Party (UK) MPs
title: Mary Holt
